snippet: After the indictment of Chinese military hackers on Monday, a nagging question remained: What about the other 20 hacking groups intelligence officials are tracking in China?
abstract: After the indictment of Chinese military hackers on Monday, a nagging question remained: What about the other 20 hacking groups intelligence officials are tracking in China?

headline.main: Questions Remain After Chinese Hacking Indictments
